author: Fextralife
description:
I Played Dawn of War IV - Hands-On Gameplay Impressions
In this Fextralife video, I want to talk a little bit about my hands-on impressions with Dawn of War 4.I can't believe that I got to play Dawn of War 4. This is one of the games i was really looking forward to that I had no idea was in development until Gamescom. It is a ton of fun to play.

Timestamp:
0:00 Dawn of War IV Hands-On Impressions
0:59 Developed by King Art Games
2:04 Gameplay Impressions
2:40 Cover system
3:33 Requisition Points
4:55 Challenging gameplay
6:14 Factions
7:55 Excited for Dawn of War IV
